articles.description: President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said that the situation along the front of Ukraine's war with Russia was the best it had been in three months, with Moscow's troops no longer advancing after their capture last month of the eastern city of Avdiivka.
articles.title: Bracing for battle: Ukraine's recruits and volunteers train to bolster defence against Russia
